Package seedu.address.commons.core

Class LogsCenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • seedu.address.commons.core.LogsCenter

  • public class LogsCenter
extends java.lang.Object
    Configures and manages loggers and handlers, including their logging level Named Loggers can be obtained from this class
    These loggers have been configured to output messages to the console and a .log file by default, at the INFO level. A new .log file with a new numbering will be created after the log file reaches 5MB big, up to a maximum of 5 files.

      LogsCenter​()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.lang.String getEventHandlingLogMessage​(BaseEvent e)  
      static java.lang.String getEventHandlingLogMessage​(BaseEvent e, java.lang.String message)
      Decorates the given string to create a log message suitable for logging event handling methods.
      static <T> java.util.logging.Logger getLogger​(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
      Creates a Logger for the given class name.
      static java.util.logging.Logger getLogger​(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a logger with the given name.
      static void init​(Config config)
      Initializes with a custom log level (specified in the config object) Loggers obtained *AFTER* this initialization will have their logging level changed
      Logging levels for existing loggers will only be updated if the logger with the same name is requested again from the LogsCenter.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
